jobs_results.title: Trabajo Desde Casa iOS Developer / Ref. 0047
jobs_results.description:
En BairesDev® llevamos 15 años liderando proyectos de tecnología para clientes como Google, Rolls-Royce y las startups más innovadoras de Silicon Valley. Actualmente, contamos con un equipo de 4000 profesionales conformado por el top 1% de la industria trabajando de forma remota desde más de 50 países.Al postularte a esta vacante, estarás dando el primer paso en un proceso que va más allá de lo convencional: Buscaremos conocer en profundidad tus habilidades, intereses y expectativas con el objetivo de realizar una búsqueda personalizada y encontrar el rol ideal para ti en BairesDev.

iOS Developer en BairesDev

Ser un Desarrollador Senior iOS en nuestro equipo de Desarrollo es como ser un solucionador de problemas a tiempo completo. Esperamos que tus habilidades sean una combinación de experiencia, conocimientos e independencia. Innovación también está en el corazón de la estrategia en BairesDev. Así que, si estás dispuesto a asumir las tareas más complejas y ser un maestro en tu pila de tecnología, para iOS, entonces tu eres probablemente uno de esos únicos que estamos buscando.

¿Qué harás?

- Crear excelentes aplicaciones móviles que se integren con servicios en la nube.
- Participar en el ciclo de vida completa del desarrollo de producto, desde la ideación hasta la entrega y el soporte.
- Trabajar dentro de un equipo de rápido movimiento para desarrollar diseños nítidos, crear un gran código y llevar productos al mercado rápidamente.
- Liderar el desarrollo e implementación de nuevas mejoras claves.
- Ayudarnos continuamente a evolucionar nuestros procesos y diseños para generar una ventaja competitiva.
- Crear maquetas y prototipos para expresar ideas y recopilar feedback.
- Compartir tus pensamientos e ideas de manera libre y constructiva, pero también escuchar bien a los demás.
- Crear las mejores aplicaciones móviles para dispositivos iOS y relojes inteligentes.

¿Qué Buscamos?:

- 6+ años de experiencia trabajando como desarrollador.
- 5+ años de experiencia en desarrollo iOS.
- Experiencia con bases de datos SQL y NoSQL.
- Experiencia con Microservicios y la Nube.
- Conocimiento avanzado en algoritmos.
- Conocimiento en infraestructura de TI.
- Gestión de metodología ágil intermedia.
- Sólida comprensión de las mejores prácticas, principios SÓLIDOS, código LIMPIO y soluciones escalables.
- Conocimiento en diseño de patrones.
- Experiencia desarrollando aplicaciones completas desde cero.
- Experiencia en pruebas automatizadas, procesos CI/CD.
- Experiencia sólida en control de versiones.
- Experiencia comprobada en pruebas unitarias, pruebas integrales y cobertura de código.
- Nivel Avanzado de Inglés.

Qué ofrecemos para que tu trabajo (y tu vida) sea más fácil:

- Trabajo 100% remoto: trabaja desde tu casa o donde quieras.
- Compensación en USD o en tu moneda local, como prefieras, muy por encima de la media del mercado.
- Hardware y software.
- Horarios flexibles
- Licencias por mater/paternidad, vacaciones y días festivos nacionales pagos.
- Ambiente laboral multicultural e innovador, perfecto para hacer amigos, colaborar y aprender de las personas más talentosas del mundo.
- Oportunidades de crecimiento y desarrollo profesional a través de mentorías y entrenamientos.

¡Únete a nuestro equipo global!.

-Requerimientos- Educación mínima: Educación superior - Licenciatura
5 años de experiencia
Idiomas: Inglés
Conocimientos: Tecnología de la información, SWIFT, Objective-C, Lean, Agile
Palabras clave: remoto, remote, teletrabajo, home, desarrollador, programador

jobs_results.title: Senior Native Mobile App Developer (Offshore)
jobs_results.description:
Senior Native Mobile App Developer (Offshore)
• Location: Offshore/Remote
• Working Hours: UK business hours, 9am-5pm, Mon-Fri, weekly
• Pay Rate: Up to £2000 GBP per month, fixed
• Employment Type: Full-time Freelance Contract (40hrs per week)
• Language Requirements: Must be fluent in English both verbally & in writing
• Start Date: January 2025 start
• Project Duration: 6+ months (estimated), high likelihood of renewal

About Handyman Interactive

We are an innovative software development firm dedicated to partnering with our clients to build specialised engineering teams tailored for startups and SMEs/SMBs. Our technology-first approach ensures that we meet the bespoke needs of each client by delivering game-changing solutions. We are looking for a dedicated Senior Native Mobile App Developer to join our remote team.

Role Overview

This role is perfect for an experienced developer who excels in both native iOS development using Swift and native Android development using Java. The role involves working closely with stakeholders to gather and clarify requirements, demonstrating working software, and serving as a senior or lead mobile developer within a team-oriented environment.

Key Responsibilities
• Develop, implement, and maintain high-quality native mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms.
• Collaborate directly with stakeholders to elicit and clarify requirements, ensuring a clear understanding of project goals.
• Demonstrate working software to stakeholders, incorporating feedback into iterative development.
• Take the lead in mobile development projects, ensuring alignment with industry best practices, and guide less experienced team members.
• Contribute to the continuous improvement of software development processes.
• Participate in code reviews, providing and receiving constructive feedback.
• Stay updated with the latest trends and advancements in mobile app development to ensure forward-thinking solutions.

Key Requirements
• 5+ years of comprehensive experience in native mobile app development, with expertise in both Swift for iOS and Java for Android.
• Proven ability to engage with stakeholders effectively and translate business requirements into clear technical specifications.
• Exceptional ability to deliver high-quality software within deadlines.
• Fluent proficiency in English, both written and verbal.
• Ability and willingness to work within UK timezone business hours.
• Strong problem-solving skills and a proactive mindset towards challenges.

What Handyman Interactive Offers
• A supportive and dynamic work environment.
• Engagement in exciting projects that innovate and drive business success.
• Remote work flexibility as a full-time freelancer, set at 40 hours per week.
• Competitive pay of up to £2000 per month, fixed.

Join our offshore freelance team and contribute to projects that are making a real difference through innovation in mobile technology!

jobs_results.title: Ios Developer
jobs_results.description:
iOS Developer

We are seeking an experienced iOS Developer to join our team, working from home.

Benefits:
• $100,000 MXN Monthly (4 years of experience)
• $110,000 MXN Monthly (6 years of experience)
• Food vouchers
• Law benefits
• Medical insurance
• Vacations
• Saving fund
• Christmas bonus
• Life insurance

About the Job:

We require a skilled iOS Developer with 4+ years of experience in designing, building, refactoring, and releasing native apps. The ideal candidate will have proven experience with Objective-C/Swift on iOS and a strong understanding of testing methodologies such as TDD, pairing, code reviews, and other techniques to maintain high-quality code and resiliency.

jobs_results.title: Android & Ios Developer - [DE093]
jobs_results.description:
Join us!
At Lumston, we take pride in being a socially responsible Mexican company that deeply values our team members.
As a major Amazon partner in Mexico, Lumston holds a prominent position in the industry.
Come be a part of our dynamic and forward-thinking team!
Together, we'll shape a brighter future.
• *Requirements**:

- Collaborate with multidisciplinary teams to define, design, plan, and implement new features.
- Make technical decisions and assess development trade-offs.
- Design and implement unit tests to ensure robustness, including edge cases, usability, and overall reliability.
- Maintain ongoing communication with the team to receive feedback on outcomes.
- Continuously explore, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency.
- Possess a strong understanding and knowledge of the business or work area.
- Maintain a critical perspective on activities and processes to enhance the work plan.
- Work as part of a team.
- Assist and support others whenever possible, recognizing that collective knowledge surpasses individual expertise.
- Identify project risk factors and provide relevant feedback.
Key Responsibilities:

- Implement design patterns like MVVM.
- Consume REST API services.
- Utilize tools such as Dagger Hilt, Retrofit, Coroutines, LiveData, and DataBinding.
- Work with navigation components and Room (Android).
- Implement push notifications.
- Review and assess methodologies and technologies used in development, implementing new ones if necessary to improve product quality and client relations.
• *Requirements**:

- **Knowledge of Swift and Kotlin.
• *:

- Experience with **SwiftUI, UIKit, Xcode, CocoaPods, Git, and Core Data (iOS).
• *:

- Familiarity with MVVM and architectures like MVC.
- Experience in unit testing.
- Experience in app publication.
• *Profile**:

- Work Mode: Full-time
- Relocation: Not required.
- Schedule: Flexible, with availability to adapt to role demands.
- Travel: No
- English: Intermediate

Values:

- Passion
- Excellence
- Agility
- Human-Centered Approach

Competencies:

- Analytical thinking
- Problem-solving skills
- Teamwork
- Effective communication
• *Benefits**
- Welcome Kit
- Home Office
- Flexible Schedule
- Birthday off
- Vacations from day one
- Life insurance
- Insurance for Major Medical Expenses (50% coverage)
- Saving fund (you save 6% of your monthly salary, and we match that 6% for you)
- Support for remote work (Electricity and Internet)
- AWS Certifications
- Free courses or trainings
- English Classes
- Dining Room (Guadalajara only)
- Sports fields (Guadalajara only)
- Gym (Guadalajara only)

jobs_results.title: Software Developer - iOS App Development
jobs_results.description:
About Capital One

We're on a mission to revolutionize banking through cutting-edge technologies like iOS mobile applications. Our engineers are passionate about delivering exceptional experiences, and we're looking for talented individuals to join our team.

Salary: $120,000 - $180,000 per year

jobs_results.title: Android e iOS Developer con experiencia en Kotlin / Java
jobs_results.description:
El Desarrollador móvil es un experimentado con pasión por crear aplicaciones móviles eficientes, fáciles de usar e innovadoras. Competente en plataformas Android e iOS, con una sólida base en lenguajes y principios de diseño de desarrollo móvil. Hábil en colaborar con equipos multifuncionales para traducir los requisitos comerciales, en experiencias móviles atractivas. Aprender y adaptarse continuamente a las tecnologías emergentes para mantenerse a la vanguardia de las tendencias de desarrollo móvil en Storecheck.

Funciones Especificas:
1.- Trabaja en conjunto con el equipo de Desarrollo Móvil, Desarrollando aplicaciones móviles (Android, iOS)
2.- Dominio de lenguajes de programación: Java y KOTLIN (para Android), ionic y angular (para iOS).
3.- Realiza pruebas y depuraciones exhaustivas para garantizar la calidad y el rendimiento de las aplicaciones móviles en diferentes dispositivos y versiones de sistema operativo.
4.- Asegura el cumplimiento de los planes de trabajo.
5.- Trabaja con el equipo de UX y colabora activamente para lograr un producto atractivo, intuitivo, agil y flexible..

Experiencia:
1.- 1+ años de experiencia como ingeniero de software
2.- Titulado de Ingeniería en sistemas, software o carrera afin.
3.- Desarrollando soluciones de software utilizando lenguajes como KOTLIN, IONIC, Angular y JAVA.
4.- Con Metodologias / Tecnologias como SCRUM, GIT, JIRA. Etc.
5.- Conocimiento de programación orientada a objetos, programación estructurada. Conocimiento de Base de Datos relacionales y no relacionales.
6.- Gestión de plataformas: App store y Play Store, Firebase, loggly
• INDISPENSABLE VIVIR EN QUERÉTARO

Ofrecemos:
1.- Sueldo Atractivo
2.- Esquema hibrido (70% Home Office y 30% Oficina)
3.- Vales de Despensa / SGMM
4.- Flex Friday

jobs_results.title: ID 3838 – iOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: Latin America

Job Category: iOS
Job Type: Remote - Full Time
Job Location: LATAM

About us:
Our mission is to nurture creativity so you can make it. We are a leading photo and video editor with a library of 200+ premium quality presets and tools, an easy-to-use video editor, and a curated collection of photography of all genres, styles and aesthetics from our global community of talented creators. We are looking for humble overachievers and self-starters who are naturally curious, highly organized, and thrive in a fast-paced, ever-changing environment. We foster a culture of collaboration, inclusion, ambition, and progress.

Qualifications:
● Strong proficiency in Swift programming language and SwiftUI framework.
● Familiarity with Objective-C (secondary)
● Problem-Solving Skills: Ability to tackle complex technical challenges at scale.
● Collaboration: Effective communication and teamwork with product managers and cross-functional teams.
● Leadership: Initiative and ability to guide and mentor team members.

Benefits:
● 100% remote.
● USD payment.
● 2 weeks of PTO.

Great, just keep talking to your recruiter.

This offer from "CONEXIONHR - Recruiting Company" has been enriched by Jobgether.com and got a 80% flex score.

jobs_results.title: Senior Ios Developer
jobs_results.description:
Job Title: iOS Developer

We are seeking a skilled iOS developer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have 4+ years of professional software development experience, with expertise in Xcode and iOS development.
Responsibilities:
• Produce a reliable, performant, configurable, state-of-the-art SDK for iOS and tvOS.
• Write clean, concise, readable code that follows common design patterns while adhering to best engineering practices.
• Strive to constantly improve quality of engineering through code reviews, pair programming and other collaborative practices.
• Ensure quality and confidence in software by writing effective automated unit tests.
Requirements:
• 4+ years of professional software development experience.
• Experience with Xcode and iOS development.
• Experience writing testable code in Swift.
• Value collaboration with teammates and stakeholders.
Advantages:
• TN Visa Sponsorship.
• USDPay.
• Health Insurance, including Dental and Vision.
• Life and Disability Insurance.
• 401K Retirement Plan.
Estimated Salary:

$120,000 - $180,000 per year.

jobs_results.title: iOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: Latin America, Mexico

Location: Remote (Based in Latin America)

About the Role:
We are seeking a talented and motivated iOS Developer to join our dynamic team. As an iOS Developer, you will play a key role in designing, developing, and maintaining innovative mobile applications that delight our users. This is a fully remote position, and we are looking for candidates based in Latin America to collaborate within our team across time zones effectively.

Key Responsibilities:
• Design, develop, and maintain high-performance, reliable, and scalable iOS applications.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including designers, product managers, and backend developers, to define and deliver new features.
• Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code following best practices for iOS development.
• Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications through rigorous testing and debugging.
• Stay up to date with the latest industry trends, tools, and technologies to continuously improve development processes.
• Participate in code reviews to ensure high-quality standards and knowledge sharing within the team.
• Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability.

Qualifications:
• Proven experience (3+ years) as an iOS Developer.
• Proficiency in Swift and Objective-C for iOS development.
• Strong understanding of iOS SDK, Xcode, and design patterns.
• Experience working with RESTful APIs and third-party libraries.
• Familiarity with version control systems such as Git.
• Knowledge of mobile UI/UX standards and guidelines.
• Experience with testing frameworks and debugging tools for iOS applications.
• Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
• Strong communication and teamwork skills.

Preferred Qualifications:
• Experience with SwiftUI.
• Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines for mobile applications.
• Knowledge of app performance optimization techniques.
• Experience in agile development environments.

Benefits:
• Fully remote work environment.
• Flexible working hours.
• Opportunities for professional growth and development.
• A supportive and inclusive team culture.

If you are passionate about building exceptional iOS applications and want to work in a remote, collaborative, and innovative environment, we would love to hear from you!

This offer from "Rivka Development" has been enriched by Jobgether.com and got a 80% flex score.
